bin2HexDigit

public static java.lang.String bin2HexDigit(java.lang.String fourBinaryBits)
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Converts a single nibble.

Parameters:
fourBinaryBits - A string containing four binary bits E.g. "1011".
Returns:
A string containing the hex equivalent E.g. "B".
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if string is not valid binary.

bin2HexDigits

public static java.lang.String bin2HexDigits(java.lang.String xBinaryBits)
Converts an arbitrary number of bits.

Parameters:
xBinaryBits - A string containing an arbitrary number of binary bits.
Returns:
A string containing the hex equivalent.

padToNibbles

public static java.lang.String padToNibbles(java.lang.String xBinaryBits)
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Pads an arbitrary number of bits to a multiple of four.

Parameters:
xBinaryBits - An abitrary number of bits.
Returns:
A string containing the bits, zero left padded to a multiple of four.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if string is not four valid digits.

isValidBinary

public static boolean isValidBinary(java.lang.String xBinaryBits)
Checks if a string contains valid binary. i.e. 1's and 0's.

Parameters:
xBinaryBits - The string to check.
Returns:
True if valid, else false.
